ivardefs.name: author
ivardefs.desc: Person who received the answers to the questions in the QuestionnaireResponse and recorded them in the system.

ivardefs.name: authored
ivardefs.desc: The date and/or time that this set of answers were last changed.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: The order, proposal or plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this QuestionnaireResponse.  For example, a ServiceRequest seeking an intake assessment or a decision support recommendation to assess for post-partum depression.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this questionnaire response was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: A business identifier assigned to a particular completed (or partially completed) questionnaire.

ivardefs.name: item_
ivardefs.desc: A group or question item from the original questionnaire for which answers are provided.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: A procedure or observation that this questionnaire was performed as part of the execution of.  For example, the surgery a checklist was executed as part of.

ivardefs.name: questionnaire
ivardefs.desc: The Questionnaire that defines and organizes the questions for which answers are being provided.

ivardefs.name: source
ivardefs.desc: The person who answered the questions about the subject.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The position of the questionnaire response within its overall lifecycle.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The subject of the questionnaire response.  This could be a patient, organization, practitioner, device, etc.  This is who/what the answers apply to, but is not necessarily the source of information.

properties.desc: A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the questionnaire being responded to.
